amendment.description: To express the sense of the Senate on funding for national defense in future fiscal years.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 4239 withdrawn in Senate.
Amendment SA 4239 proposed by Senator Inhofe. (consideration: CR S2062; text: CR S2062) To express the sense of the Senate on funding for national defense in future fiscal years.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4239 proposed by Senator Inhofe.
